dynamic_line: &The brownie starts when it sees you and makes ready to vanish, then it takes a closer look at you.  "Oh. Oh!  I'm terribly sorry, I didn't realize there was already one of us here.  I'll take my leave."

responses.text: Us?  What are you talking about?
Us?  What are you talking about?
Us?  What are you talking about?

dynamic_line: &The brownie looks at you closely.  "You don't know?  Oh dear, you don't know, do you?  Well, it's not my place to tell you, you'll have to figure it out.  That's part of why they put you here, after all."  Before you can get in another word, the brownie spins in a circle and vanishes.
